Kissimmee Bay Country Club 2801 Kissimmee Bay Cir , Kissimmee , Florida , 34744 View as map Write a Review Feedback from Golfers GolfPass Rating Index 0 82% Recommend 2683 Reviews Quick Facts Holes 18 Par 71 Length 6830 yards Slope 132 Rating 72.4 Year built: 1990 Architect(s): Lloyd Clifton Greens: Bermuda Grass Fairways: Bermuda Grass Season: Year round View Tee Times Featured Course Info Reviews Kissimmee Bay Country Club 2801 Kissimmee Bay Cir , Kissimmee , Florida , 34744 View as Map Write a Review Holes 18 Par 71 Length 6830 yards Slope 132 Rating 72.4 Year built: 1990 Architect(s): Lloyd Clifton Greens: Bermuda Grass Fairways: Bermuda Grass Season: Year round Carved out of natural Florida landscape, the golf course at semi-private Kissimmee Bay Country Club is a favorite among golfers in the Orlando area. The par-71 course, which measures 6,846 yards from the back tees, opened in 1990 and was designed by Lloyd Clifton. The architect routes through the course through century old oaks covered by Spanish moss, tall Cypress trees, numerous ponds, lakes, and beautiful wetlands.? The course has five sets of tees, starting at 5,104 yards, so it's set up for every level of golfer. The front nine, which is a par 36, is the longer of the two nines at 3,551 yards. It's also where you will find the no. 1 handicap hole, the 443-yard, par-4 third hole. The straightaway hole is not only long, but it's narrow, tree-lined all the way to a green protected by large bunkers. Most of the lakes are located on the back nine. In fact, the largest is between the par-5 first hole and the par-18th, where tee shots lost to the right will find the water. One of the prettiest holes on the course is the 185-yard, par-3 13th, which is all carry over a portion of a lake to the green. In addition to the golf course, Kissimmee Bay Country Club also offers a driving range, short-game area, and practice putting green. Lessons are also available. The club also has its own golf museum as well as a well-stocked golf shop, restaurant, and banquet facilities in the clubhouse. more... Weddings - Kissimmee Bay Country Club Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content Kissimmee Bay Country Club Home Tee Times Golf Course Information Practice Facilities Golf Pro Shop Photo Gallery Membership Membership Information Events Weddings & Banquets Outings Dining Contact Blog Weddings Beautiful Venues That Bring Your Dreams to Life Kissimmee Bay Country Club is a jewel in the Orlando area for weddings and banquets and all your special events. With views of the lakes and sweeping vistas of the natural beauty of our course, we offer you and your guests the absolute best in ambiance as well as service that will exceed your expectations. Our ballrooms are spacious and elegant and will accommodate your distinguished guest list up to 225 people. With golf course views providing an amazing backdrop, the refined decor enhances the experience for all your guests. The result is a truly remarkable occasion befitting your milestone event. A Blissful Setting That’s Picture Perfect in Every Way The gorgeous natural beauty of tropical Florida, the tastefully elegant ballrooms… these are the foundations of your special event. To make a truly perfect occasion, however, you’ll also need a team of experts on your side. Our wedding and banquet team provides outstanding service from start to finish so your day is not only special… it’s blissful. From the moment you team up with Kissimmee Bay Country Club for your wedding or banquet, you’re in the best hands. We work with couples, families, and corporate organizers to create a custom event that meets and exceeds everyone’s expectations. We know that once-in-a-lifetime events require nothing less! Custom Event Planning to Make Your Day Spectacular Wedding consultants offer couples a variety of options to make your day turn out just as you’ve always imagined it would be. We know every bride has her own unique vision and it’s our mission to make that vision a reality. Toward that end, we work with couples to create a wedding package to fit not only your vision but also your wallet. In fact, for weddings in the Orlando area, we’re known for providing the fullest array of options. With the unmatched flexibility of our packages, we’ll see to it that you come in within your specified budget. Choose from a number of pre-planned and convenient flexible packages or let us create a tailor your event to your exact specifications. We’ll work with you in every aspect of the event so that your dream wedding becomes a reality. Sumptuous Food for the Party of Your Dreams The tropical backdrop, the elegant venue, the perfect plans, and let’s not forget the wedding banquet. Whether your planning on plated service, a sumptuous buffet, or specialty stations for your reception, we’ll make it happen just the way you’re envisioning. We want you and your guests to enjoy every aspect of this lifetime event — and of course that includes the dining experience as well. Bringing it All Together for Your Special Day To bring it all together, our staff offers you and your guests impeccable service from start to finish. No guest will want for anything — only for your wedding or special event to last just a little longer! Contact Kissimmee Bay Country Club today and ask for our event planner to get started making your plans. Together, we’ll create an event to remember. Weddings Request Please enable JavaScript in your browser to complete this form. Pro-Shop - Kissimmee Bay Country Club Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content Kissimmee Bay Country Club Home Tee Times Golf Course Information Practice Facilities Golf Pro Shop Photo Gallery Membership Membership Information Events Weddings & Banquets Outings Dining Contact Blog Pro-Shop Golf Pros Who Know the Sport, Inside & Out You’re in Florida, the home of great golfing. Expect everything you love about the sport to be just a little better than other places you go. That includes service, of course. Whether you’re a local or you’re just visiting, you’ll want to check out our Pro Shop, too … because not only do we boast a spectacular golf course, our Pro Shop is fantastic, too. In our Pro Shop, golfers will find an atmosphere of professionalism marked by a notable passion for golf. Staff members are always eager to talk about the sport they love and the game they can’t get enough of. The Ultimate in Golf Shopping Stop by for the latest on gear, apparel, equipment, and tips. You won’t get the usual, bland retail experience, either. Instead, you’ll find dedicated professionals who are geared up and ready to show you what’s new this week. Wondering what’s trending in golf bags lately? Ask a staff member to show you. Interested in what equipment the pros are using these days to sharpen their game? So are we! Stop by and we’ll show you the latest. Service That’s Fit for the Stars We know there are a lot of famous golf courses in Florida, with a lot of celebrity players who demand the ultimate in service. Kissimmee Bay Country Club treats every member like a celebrity, offering white glove service in every aspect of the game. Book your tee times, ask about caddie services and professional instruction, and of course sign up for a club fitting. Remember: we love the sport just as much as you do, so all our staff are hand-picked professionals. They’re driven by the desire to help you enjoy the sport and play a better game and they’ll go to great lengths to ensure your time at Kissimmee Bay Country Club is well-spent and perfect in every way. Helping Golfers Improve Their Game in Every Way Along with the first-class service mentality that you’ll encounter from our pro shop, you’ll also encounter a range of equipment and apparel designed and produced by today’s top brands. Discover golf apparel that fits your style, whether it’s classic and subdued or trendy and colorful. Either way, you’ll find apparel with sun protection built in, moisture-wicking fabrics that keep you comfortable, and a range of other features that help you play your best game. Learn about high-tech equipment designed by today’s best golf engineers. Putters, drivers, and accessories that allow your true potential to shine through: all here and ready for you to explore. From the clothing that keeps you cool and dry to the latest putter that helps lower your score, it’s all here… and if you don’t find it here, talk to our helpful, friendly staff and they can find it for you. Whatever it takes, we’re here to ensure your ultimate enjoyment of the game you love. Tournaments - Kissimmee Bay Country Club Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content Kissimmee Bay Country Club Home Tee Times Golf Course Information Practice Facilities Golf Pro Shop Photo Gallery Membership Membership Information Events Weddings & Banquets Outings Dining Contact Blog Tournaments Welcoming All Players to Enjoy the Kissimmee Bay Experience Kissimmee Bay Country Club provides the perfect location for your next Golf Outing or Tournament. When you host with us, every player who participates in your event gets to enjoy the Kissimmee Bay experience. From our nationally recognized course to the exceptional staff and amenities of our club, the full range of facilities and staff are at your disposal. Together, working with you, we’ll create the a successful and memorable tournament, charity event, or corporate outing. An Ideal Location Here in the Orlando Area For tournaments that draw a crowd from afar, our proximity to Orlando International Airport is ideal. And for local events or corporate outings, we’re located less than half an hour’s drive from downtown Orlando. A Spectacular Setting for a World-Class Event Our course was nominated by Golf Digest as one of the nation’s best new courses. Once you’re here, it’s apparent why: century-old oak trees, magnificent cypress trees, and incredible water challenges provide the perfect setting for a championship course and immaculate playing conditions. Out-of-town golfers always marvel at the local flock of Sand Hill cranes that have made the aquatic areas of our golf course their home. There’s all kinds of wildlife, in fact, around every bend. Combined with the gorgeous tropical palms and old-growth stands of forest that frame the course, that makes for a spectacular setting for your event. Red to Gold, a Course for Every Competitor We know that golf tournaments and corporate outings often need to accommodate players of every level. That’s why everyone appreciates the five different levels of play out on our course. From the 5,104-yard option to our full 6,830 par 71 championship course, there’s a challenge for every competitor. And for everyone, there are top notch practice facilities for warm-up activities before the main event. Our driving range is state-of-the-art Our grass surface is ready all year ‘round Our targets are numerous for a complete and thorough warm-up session Our bunkers are expertly designed Our range balls are top notch quality A Banquet Hall for Your Post-Game Events Whether it’s a charity tournament or a championship event, the 3,000 sq ft clubhouse can be set up to suit your exact specifications. We know the success of your event hinges upon every detail being perfect, and our banquet staff are there to help see you through every step. There’s also a banquet tent for your tournament or outing, should your plans call for one. It can easily accommodate 200 guests, so no matter how large a showing you’re expecting, we’ll make it work! Catering With Just the Right Touch And let’s not forget the finishing touch for your event: the food. Our in-house chefs will work with you to create exactly what’s needed to pull off your event. Buffet, cocktails, barbecue … bring us your plans and we’re there to make it happen. Got Your Tournament Date Pinned Down? Let’s Begin! To request your event date, call us or fill out the form below or give us a call (407) 348-4653. That’s all you need to start planning your tournament or golf outing today. We’ll take care of the rest, and make sure your event is a success in every way. Book now to get the best possible dates and tee times fill out the form below or call Call Kissimmee Bay Country Club for tournament info at(407) 348-4653 . Tournaments Request Please enable JavaScript in your browser to complete this form. Kissimmee Bay Country Club ⛳️ Book Golf Online • golfscape™ Explore Destinations Help Log In Sign Up Language Currency How can we help? How can I book a tee time? 1 Navigate to your preferred golf course. Select your date of play, tee time, rentals, and number of players – and then click Book. You will receive an instant email confirmation and your tee time will be guaranteed at the course. Can I modify or cancel a booking? 1 Absolutely! If you are within the cancellation policy of your tee time, navigate to the Manage Booking page to modify or cancel your booking. What is your cancellation policy? 1 You can typically cancel your booking for a full refund within 48 hours of your tee time, but this may vary slightly by course. Cancellation policies are defined by each golf course and are clearly marked during the entire booking process as well as in your email confirmation. Why should I book with golfscape? 1 We are the only service who’s technology operates at all our partner courses – that means tee times and rates on golfscape are sourced directly. So when you make a booking, your reservation is confirmed instantly at the golf course. How can I get more help? 1 You may communicate with us anytime using the button below or email us at [email protected] – we’re happy to help! Home - Kissimmee Bay Country Club Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content Kissimmee Bay Country Club Home Tee Times Golf Course Information Practice Facilities Golf Pro Shop Photo Gallery Membership Membership Information Events Weddings & Banquets Outings Dining Contact Blog Book Tee Times Reserve your round at Kissimmee Bay or Remington Golf Club online! Book Course Info Surrounding the fairways, look for oak trees that date back a hundred years — a rarity in this region. View Now Membership Whether you’ve been golfing for years, or you have never held a club, KBCC has what you need. More Info Weddings Our ballrooms are spacious and elegant and will accommodate your distinguished guest list up to 225 people. More Info Kissimmee Bay Country Club Just 15 minutes from Orlando International Airport and 25 minutes from downtown Orlando, as well as all major tourist attractions in the area, Kissimmee Bay Country Club provides a convenient break from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. Here, you can ease into a relaxing round of golf in a casual setting surrounded by the gorgeous Florida landscape. Within one visit to Kissimmee Bay, you will understand why it was nominated one of America’s “Best New Courses” by Golf Digest. The course, opened in 1990 and designed by Lloyd Clifton, is a traditional 6,830-yard, par-71, southern-style championship golf course. The layout was cut from an old oak forest, and features lofty cypress trees, a dozen intriguing and challenging water hazards, and the presence of friendly Sandhill Cranes. While you’re here, take a free visit to our extensive golf museum, or step into our clubhouse for a unique sense of culture you will find nowhere else in Central Florida. Our members enjoy a relaxed, yet elegant atmosphere that is accepting of locals and visitors, alike. Here at Kissimmee Bay Country Club, we promise to be a truly enjoyable golf and social experience that you will not soon forget. Dining - Kissimmee Bay Country Club Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content Kissimmee Bay Country Club Home Tee Times Golf Course Information Practice Facilities Golf Pro Shop Photo Gallery Membership Membership Information Events Weddings & Banquets Outings Dining Contact Blog Dining Luxe, Tropical Panoramas: The Cornerstone of Casual Elegance Kissimmee Bay Country Club is more than just a premier golfing experience. As a member, you and your guests also have access to a top notch dining experience. It all starts with the sweeping views of our southern-style championship golf course. We know that even after you’ve stepped off the golf course, you’re still going to appreciate the natural beauty of the grounds at Kissimmee Bay. The course offers majestic viewpoints and calming vistas from every angle. Framed by century-old oak trees, and grand old cypress trees, the course invokes a bit of ‘Old Florida’. Keep an eye out for the Sand Hill Cranes that have taken up residence among the aquatic areas on the course. We value their presence, as they too represent the natural beauty of our lovely state! All this and more highlight the sense that dining with us means extending the golf experience as you savor the views and take in the natural beauty of our course. The Clubhouse at Kissimmee Bay The flora and the fauna out on the course provide the ambiance but it’s inside where you’ll find the true magic that makes dining with us so special. Our clubhouse is the heart of the Kissimmee Bay Country Club dining experience. It takes a special blend of passion and experience to create the unique brand of casual elegance we’ve come to be known for. Members, visitors, and locals all feel equally welcome within these walls — we strive in every way to make sure everything is just right for our guests. Lunch or Dinner: a Menu for Champions Our menu is tailored for golfers and guests who seek classic, delicious fare that’s served up fresh. To that end, you’ll find a simple selection of favorites designed to satisfy your tastes before or after your game. Lunch And what’s in store at lunchtime? First and foremost, our chef invites you to try our featured-and-famous Bay Burger. It’s classic and simple, but of course fantastic and delicious. That’s because, like all our burger entrees, it’s hand-pressed when you order… it’s definitely the way to a fresher, tastier burger! The culinary team also invites you to check out our Daily Specials. Every day is something new, so be sure to ask the restaurant staff about our Daily Special to learn more! Stop in For a Bite and a Warm ‘Hello’ As a member, a local or a one-time visitor; you’re always welcome at Kissimmee Bay Country Club. Stop in for a bite to eat or head directly out onto the links for a round of golf amidst gorgeous surroundings. We can’t wait to see you! Practice Facilities - Kissimmee Bay Country Club Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content Kissimmee Bay Country Club Home Tee Times Golf Course Information Practice Facilities Golf Pro Shop Photo Gallery Membership Membership Information Events Weddings & Banquets Outings Dining Contact Blog Practice Facilities Kissimmee Bay Driving Range & Practice Facilities Situated not far from the busy pace of downtown Orlando, Kissimmee Bay Country Club’s remarkable practice facilities have earned it recognition among local and visiting golfers alike. Peaceful, impeccably-maintained, and open year ‘round, our practice areas have become a favorite with locals as well as a popular hit with visitors from out of town who just can’t stay away from a great game of golf. Perfect every aspect of your game! Every golfer has their strengths and their weaknesses. Show your strength on the course but be sure to work on your weaknesses at our practice facilities. Improve your swing on our impeccably-kept driving range or perfect your short game at our putting green or chipping areas. Or better yet: do both! Warm up before your game or de-stress by hitting a few buckets of balls after work. Make it a social event and invite some colleagues from work or bring your grandkids. There are dozens of reasons to take advantage of our practice facilities but you only need one! State-of-the-art practice facilities for your enjoyment. We pour every ounce the same level of dedication into maintaining our practice facilities as we do our golf course. That’s why we’re proud to say that our driving range is 100 percent grass. The views are just as spectacular as the main course, too. Nestled among the cypress and the oak trees, the practice area is designed to ensure that you’ll love every minute of your practice time while you’re here with us. Chipping and putting areas also receive the same level of care. Members are often surprised to hear that our staff replaces the grass in the short game practice area whenever it starts to become worn. That way, when you arrive for your practice session, you’ll always assured of fresh, good grass so you can maximize your practice time. We know your schedule is busy and your practice time may be limited, so it’s important to us that everything is perfect for you and all our guests upon arrival. What are your golfing goals? We’ll help you get there! We’ve been helping golfers of all levels improve their game for a very long time. That’s how we know that everyone has an inner golfer just waiting to come out. Whether you’re a beginner or an old hand at golf, there’s always room for improvement. And of course the best way to tap into your potential is to practice. Practice facilities give you the opportunity to focus on your target areas without feeling the pressure of competition out on the course. Swing, chip, or putt at your own pace to your heart’s content: you’ll see results! And if you’d like to take your game to the next level, remember there’s always someone to offer advice and tips here at Kissimmee Bay Country Club. Stop by the Pro Shop to speak to our friendly staff — they’re always happy to talk shop! Course - Kissimmee Bay Country Club Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content Kissimmee Bay Country Club Home Tee Times Golf Course Information Practice Facilities Golf Pro Shop Photo Gallery Membership Membership Information Events Weddings & Banquets Outings Dining Contact Blog Course A Beautiful Course with Endless, Open Vistas It is our pleasure to welcome you to the Kissimmee Bay Country Club golf course. From the moment you arrive here and step foot onto our beautiful grounds, you’ll know that you are someplace very special. When the architects of Kissimmee Bay Country Club’s golf course carved the fairways out of the Florida landscape, they kept all the natural beauty intact. Surrounding the fairways, look for oak trees that date back a hundred years — a rarity in this region. And what gives the course its true Florida charm are the stands of stunning cypress trees, which were preserved from the surrounding landscapes when the course was built. Blend in some classic palm trees to anchor and frame the view and the result is a spectacularly beautiful golf course. It’s easy to see why Golf Digest nominated the course as one of America’s “Best New Courses.” Unique Challenges at Every Turn The course is designed with special attention to detail. There are many design elements to many of the world’s top championship golf courses, including the unique water challenges. Immaculate Playing Conditions We love the game of golf as much as you do, which is why we devote so much attention to the upkeep of our course. From the grass that blankets the course to the marble-white sand that fills the bunkers, it’s all kept up in immaculate condition for the enjoyment of our members and guests. So you’ll find not just breathtaking beauty when you play at Kissimmee Bay, you’ll also find the right conditions for playing your best game every time. Opportunities for Every Golfer Golfers of all abilities will find our course to be accommodating to their own level of play. Our Gold level features 6,830 yards, par 71 play and a challenging slope rating of 132. Besides Gold, there are four other levels of play, all at par 71. They range from 6,317 yards and a slope rating of 123 to 5,104 yards with a very easy slope rating. With five different options, you get to decide how difficult you want the course to be. We invite you to play the course at Kissimmee Bay Country Club. We hope that you will take the opportunity to play our beautiful course here at Kissimmee Bay Country Club. Located just 25 minutes from downtown Orlando and 30 minutes from the airport, it’s not just beautiful and very well-kept, it’s convenient, too. We invite you to stop by and play a few rounds — and if you do, please spend a minute or two in our Pro Shop. We’re always here to answer questions and discuss everyone’s favorite subject: golf! Course Yardage Par Rating Slope Gold 6,830 71 72.4 132 Blue 6,317 71 69.9 123 White 5,891 71 67.9 113 Silver 5,419 71 66.6 107 Red 5,104 71 69.6 Page Footer Local Weather KISSIMMEE WEATHER Contact Us Address : 2801 Kissimmee Bay Blvd Kissimmee, FL 34744 Email : info@playgolfinkissimmee.com Phone : (407) 348-4653 Hours : Mon-Thu: 6:30AM – 8:30PM Fri: 6AM – 8:30PM Sat, Sun & Holidays: 6AM – 9PM Copyright © 2025 Kissimmee Bay Country Club All Rights Reserved. Kissimmee Bay Country Club and Remington Golf Club – African American Golfer's Digest SUBSCRIBE Home Features News Interviews Profiles Youth Tee Leaderboards Obituaries Equipment Golf Gear Training Aids Accessories Pro Shop Shop AAGD Instruction Golf Tips Hole In One Golf Biz Tournaments African American Golf Clubs Travel Guides Hotel & Resort Reviews Destination Guides USA Destination Guides (INT’L) Trips, Get-Aways & Excursions Heard & Scene Entertainment Women’s Round Fashion Jewelry & Beauty Health & Wellness Bookshelf Calendar Upcoming Events Submit an Event Press Release Submission Videos Blogs Featured Blog Africa Golfer Of The Week Jobs/Career Education 19th Hole Auto Review Community News Podcasts 0 Home Destination Guides USA Kissimmee Bay Country Club and Remington Golf Club Destination Guides USA News Kissimmee Bay Country Club and Remington Golf Club by Debert Cook December 26, 2016 written by Debert Cook December 26, 2016 It has been estimated that over two-and-a-half million African Americans play the game of golf in the United States.  They are consumers of apparel, equipment and services (specifically travel and golf green fees) in this industry. Kissimmee Bay Country Club Kissimmee, Florida lies just south of Orlando and is located near the Orlando area theme parks. Remington Golf Club and Kissimmee Bay Country Club are located in Kissimmee and just 15min from the Orlando Airport. Both are popular golf venues for many Orlando area golfers. African American Golfers Digest recently visited both courses. I met with the courses’ management representative ChiPing Cheung and Director of Golf John Thomas. Layouts of the courses are unique and provide a different challenge for any golfer. Both courses feature aqua golf driving ranges. Some part of Kissimmee Bay Country borders Lake Tohopekaliga (also known as Lake Toho) which provides a picturesque backdrop for some of its back nine holes. Moss covered oaks and plenty of water provide a pleasant yet challenging golfing experience. My favorite hole on Kissimmee Bay is hole number 15. It is a par 4 beautiful layout with water along the right side all the way to the green. A hazard along the left side and unpredictable winds from Lake Toho makes this a spectacular but treacherous hole. Kissimmee Bay opened in 1989 and is a Lloyd Clifton design. Remington Golf Course, Kissimmee, FL The Clifton, Ezell & Clifton Golf Design Group also designed Remington Golf Club, which was built by Clubcorp and opened in 1996. Remington is known for its smooth fast tiff eagle greens. Many improvements were evident at Remington during my visit. Food service is “par excellence”. The golf experience at both courses is referred to as “World Class Golf at hometown prices”. Remington is home of the “All Day pass” which provides breakfast sandwiches, golf and lunch replay specials for one very competitive price. Mr. Cheung, a Cal Berkeley Engineering graduate who has enjoyed a long career on Wall Street, has been involved with the courses development for the past two years. His love for the game is reflected in the enthusiasm he displays for the success of the courses. He mentioned there are many planned improvements scheduled for both courses. A remodel of the Remington clubhouse was completed since my last visit there. All area African American Golf groups (Tri City Golfers, Pro Duffers Orlando and John Mann’s Pins and skins group) frequently schedule both courses throughout the year. Kissimmee Bay and Remington, as do most Orlando courses, cater to a diverse clientele. Ownership is making a special effort through their relationship with African American Golfer’s Digest to attract more African American golf groups. Kissimmee Bay and Remington offer a special invite to these groups who visit the Orlando area. Whether your group is planning a winter, summer or mid-season golf outing in Orlando, please make sure to include these courses on your itinerary. You may contact the courses directly at (407) 344-4004 to customize a package for your travel group. Kissimmee Bay CC 2801 Kissimmee Bay Blvd Kissimmee Fl, 34744  USA P: (407) 348-4653 F: (407) 348-6920 Remington Golf Club 2995 Remington Boulevard Kissimmee Fl, 34744  USA P: (407) 344-4004 F: (407) 344-9316 Otis Windham is a freelance golf writer and author with over 30 years experience in the golfing industry. He has organized national and international golf travel for various golfing groups. He is past president and travel and events coordinator for 2 major African American golfing organizations. He is a member of the African American Golfer’s Digest Advisory Board.
